lenders.name: Cruiser Art Gallery
lenders.loan_because: As a successful business we feel that it's appropriate to invest a portion of every sale by providing funds for small business entrepreneurs around the world.  One percent of our gross sales is invested to help launch and expand small business enterprise in developing countries throughout the world, thanks to KIVA.
lenders.occupational_info: Cruiser Art Gallery features prints of rusty old surfing cars (cruisers) in tropical Hawaiian beach settings.  We are mindful that we are blessed to live in a country that rewards small business entrepreneurship and want to see similar business success result from KIVA loans made to individuals all around our world.

lenders.name: Aaron Plaat
lenders.loan_because:
I feel it is very important, as an entrepreneur, to invest in others who are taking a risk in order to better their life. In America, we have been very spoiled with a sense of entitlement rather than instilled with the value of hard work and determination. 

"Love thy neighbor as you love thyself" is one of the key commandments in the Bible. I believe our neighbors are not just those around us, but those all over the world that we are able to help.
lenders.occupational_info: As a recent graduate of The Ohio State University, I've had the opportunity to gain quite a bit of experience in the startup business world prior to graduating. These have given me a foundation to provide business consultation and web development services, while I still narrow in on my career options.

I need the loan to continue the work with the community in the interior of Bahia, Brazil, do not have professional photographic cameras and camcorders, and this complicates the issue of work. Rodrigo Souza 
Itabuna, Bahia - Brazil
lenders.occupational_info: The work consists of short films from editing as films, documentaries and music events in the community. Most actors who work are children and adolescents, talents that are discovered in the middle suburbs, many excluded from society. I have already filming ready, but not yet edited. I hope to have this collaboration and I am very happy to know the KIVA, here in Brazil just heard, I believe in the Kiva and I will announce to all my friends.

lenders.name: Global Private Funding
lenders.whereabouts: Amsterdam * Colombo * Dubai * London * New York * Shanghai * Singapore
lenders.loan_because:
*** Page maintained by Michelle Taylor, Managing Director - Asia Pacific Operations ***

In most cases, it's harder to find a lender for $100.00 than finding a lender who will lend a $1,000,000.00. It almost always is that person who is looking to borrow a $100.00 that needs it the most. It's a matter of survival to a family. We do what we do so that others may prosper.

"How many lives have you touched today?" Sam Francis Senev, Chairman & CEO

GPF is currently seeking opportunities within Asia, Arabic Speaking Countries and Europe. While the Japanese, Chinese, Indians and the Middle Eastern nations have invested heavily within the US and Europe for mainly prestige and glamour, and while the US and European economies have benefitted by the foreign underwriting their national debts, GPF invests strategically in opportunities that are less glamorous yet fiscally sound and sustainable in developing nations. Traditionally nations with excess wealth such as the Middle East have had difficulty investing within their own nations external to servicing their niche market. GPF has found opportunities servicing those outlying financial needs within those countries. 

Global Private Funding, ‘a perfect marriage between dollars and good sense’.
lenders.occupational_info:
Global Private Funding Ltd. invests in developing economies supporting large scale industrial assets such as factories, resorts, banks and logistics. GPF is a third party lender and does not lend directly.

If you are interested in submitting a prospectus to GPF, please have your commercial banker contact GPF at info@globalprivatefunding.com.

If you live in a country where there isn't a Kiva Field Partner, or you for some reason want to contact us directly, please send an email to michelletaylor@globalprivatefunding.com. Your request will be given priority and reviewed with Dr. Senev as Kiva is his very personal cause. 

***** If you are looking for a specific loan, please note that this page only contains a sampling of the loans, while primarily lending is done via three other accounts that are anonymous. *****

lenders.occupational_info: Contrary to the common sense, my Law Firm is characterized for being an office of clients and not only of cases and processes.
